New England Team Racing Championship

Posted on Thursday, April 29, 2004

Team Racing New Englands are here at Dartmouth this weekend. Its going to be a very intense weekend with the top three teams going onto the nationals in Oregon. For more information on Team Racing check out the ISAF Page.
